long_description: The sun-protective Marmot Accelerator Half-Zip Shirt for boys takes the chill out of an early-morning hike or an evening stroll with breathable, quick-drying, moisture wicking fabric. Light and breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; mesh panels enhance ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Marmot Accelerator Half-Zip Shirt features flatlock seams, raglan sleeves, thumbholes and silicone grip print at pack contact points.
short_description: The sun-protective Marmot Accelerator Half-Zip Shirt for boys takes the chill out of an early-morning hike or an evening stroll with breathable, quick-drying, moisture wicking fabric.
